amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to reduce the number of the following nuclear weapons delivery vehicles of the United States: (1) Heavy bomber aircraft; (2) Air-launched cruise missiles; (3) Nuclear-powered ballistic missile submarines; (4) Submarine-launched ballistic missiles; and (5) Intercontinetal ballistic missiles.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Berg amendment (A050) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 183 (Roll no. 493).
